start.description:
The terminal sputters to life. Lines of corrupted text rain down the screen.

"BOOT ERROR: MEMORY SECTOR 7 — IRRECOVERABLE."
"UNKNOWN USER CONNECTED."

A cold current of air crawls across your neck.
You don’t remember turning this terminal on.

Type "begin" to continue.

begin.response:
Reconstructing session fragments…
Decoding timeline…

WARNING: Facility integrity compromised.
WARNING: Psychological drift detected in USER.

Your assigned location loads:
"Corridor 3 — Outer Perimeter."

corridor_entry.description:
The corridor stretches endlessly, lit only by glitching red emergency strips.
The air smells faintly metallic… like blood.
A security camera overhead pivots toward you, even though no power should be running.

Something scratches behind the wall.

You notice a **maintenance badge** lying on the floor.

Commands:
- forward
- inspect badge
- listen
- help

help.response:
Available commands:
- forward
- inspect badge
- listen

inspect badge.response:
You pick up the badge. It's cracked, but readable:
"DR. ELLA ROURKE — Cognitive Division."
On the back someone scratched:
"DON'T TRUST YOUR MEMORIES."

listen.response:
You press your ear to the wall.
The scratching stops.
Then…
A whisper:
"You're early."

forward.response:
You move ahead. Every step echoes twice.
One echo isn't yours.

junction.description:
The hall divides.
The left path is cold enough to fog your breath.
The right path hums with faint static.

A message flickers on a malfunctioning screen:
"SUBJECT EXIT ATTEMPT DETECTED — CONTAINMENT PROTOCOL ACTIVE."

Commands:
- left
- right
- check screen
- help

help.response:
Available commands:
- left (toward cold storage)
- right (toward research wing)
- check screen

check screen.response:
The screen loops distorted footage.
You see a silhouette walking these halls.
It looks like you.
But the timestamp is from **two hours ahead**.

left.response:
Your skin prickles instantly. The temperature drops sharply.
A dull rhythmic pounding echoes from ahead.

right.response:
Static grows louder. Lights flicker violently.
Something metallic scrapes across the floor in the distance.

cold_storage.description:
Frost coats the walls.
Rows of cryo-pods line the chamber — most shattered from the inside.
One pod remains intact.
Its monitor displays a name.

"USER — STATUS: UNRESPONSIVE"

Commands:
- inspect pod
- read logs
- leave
- help

help.response:
Available commands:
- inspect pod
- read logs
- leave

inspect pod.response:
You wipe frost from the glass.
Your own face stares back at you.
Sleeping.

The heartbeat monitor spikes as your real pulse races.

read logs.response:
Log Entry 12:
"Subject exhibits memory fragmentation and identity splitting."
Log Entry 13:
"Subject insists they are awake — delusion persists despite proof."

leave.response:
You step back toward the junction.
The heartbeat monitor abruptly flatlines behind you.

research_wing.description:
This wing is demolished. Claw marks gouge the metal.
Screens flash corrupted text:
"THEY ARE NOT DECEASED"
"THEY REMEMBER YOU"
"RUN"

Commands:
- inspect debris
- check monitors
- follow noise
- help

help.response:
Available commands:
- inspect debris
- check monitors
- follow noise

inspect debris.response:
You uncover a broken recorder.
It plays a woman's panicked voice:
"If you see it wearing your face — DO NOT SPEAK TO IT."
The message cuts off mid-scream.

check monitors.response:
One monitor stabilizes.
You see a live feed of the corridor behind you.
Something is standing there.
Perfectly still.
Face hidden in shadow.

follow noise.response:
The noise grows louder… wet, rhythmic, hungry.
The lights go out.
Something breathes inches from your ear.

final_passage.description:
Alarms distort into warped, metallic shrieks.
A silhouette stands ahead.
It tilts its head — exactly the way you do.

Commands:
- ask "what are you?"
- run
- help

help.response:
Available commands:
- ask "what are you?"
- run

ask \"what are you?\".response:
It steps forward.
Its voice is your voice.

"I am what you left behind in the pod."

The walls around you melt into darkness.

run.response:
You sprint blindly.
Footsteps match yours perfectly.
You collide with something solid — a terminal.
The same terminal you started at.

ending.description:
The world dissolves, leaving only the terminal glow.
A final message prints slowly:

"YOU WERE NEVER THE OBSERVER.
YOU WERE THE EXPERIMENT.
THE FACILITY EXISTS ONLY IN YOUR FRACTURED MEMORY."

Commands:
- accept
- deny
- help

accept.response:
Your vision fades.
The heartbeat slows… slows…
Until it matches the one in Cold Storage.

SESSION COMPLETE.

deny.response:
Static explodes across the screen.
The world buckles.
Your heartbeat spikes — then cuts.

SESSION FAILED.
